short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cloud-based Kudo presentation mode only capture content of your screen to be shared on web conferencing and live events.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kudo is cloud-based collaboration in multiple languages for web conferencing and live events. This cloud-based Kudo presentation mode only capture content of your screen to be shared on web conferencing and live events.
